MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the SY24 postcode area of Borth, affecting properties in Ynyslas and surrounding areas. Our emergency response team has managed to restore power to a number of properties, and we are working to restore power for those customers still without power. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of further investigations being required to locate the fault and our team are now working to get the power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 9:00AM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 7:00AM 9th April 2021
